DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the factors associated with acceptability to oral HIV pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) among Thai men who have sex with men (MSM) and transgender women (TGW).
DOC.brief_title: Acceptability of HIV Oral PrEP Among MSM and TGW
DOC.criteria: MSM or TGW at age18 years or older at enrollment Able to read and write effectively in Thai language Negative HIV testing (by assigned rapid tests) at enrollment Available to return for the study visits and willing to comply with study requirements Willing to provide reachable contact numbers and address Creatinine clearance â‰¥ 60 mL/min Negative urine protein Negative HBs Ag Symptoms suggestive for acute HIV seroconversion Participating in any interventional HIV research Has any physical or mental condition(s) that, in the opinion of the investigator(s), complicate interpretation of study outcome data
